name: Mia
description: Mia is an adorable tabby cat looking for a new home. She is a good choice if you are looking for to be a only cat household.

name: Lily
description: Lily is a true lap cat. She loves to curl up on your lap and purr away, making you feel warm and loved.

name: Leo
description: Leo is a healthy cat, and he's been neutered. You can expect many happy and healthy years with him.

name: Oliver
description: Oliver is a people-oriented cat and gets along well with children and adults. He's friendly and sociable, making him an excellent companion for families.

name: Luna
description: Luna is a clever cat, quick to learn and adapt. She can be taught tricks and is always up for a stimulating puzzle toy.

name: Rocky
description: Rocky is a sweet and loving cat who enjoys being near his humans. He'll curl up next to you for a cozy cuddle session and is sure to warm your heart with his purrs.
